## Why & How to write your R function?

**Efficiency: avoid repetitive operations using a single command**

```{r, eval=FALSE}
## To define:
name <- function(...args...) {...body...}

## To call
name(...value...)
```

## Why & How to write your R function?

Example: **How to convert UK shoe size into centimeters?**

Known: 

  - conversion formula: 3 x foot in inches â€“ 22.5 = UK size 
  - 1 inch = 2.4 cm
  

```{r}
uksize_cm <- function(uksize) {
  cm <- (uksize + 22.5) * 2.4 / 3 
  return(cm)
}

uksize_cm(9)
```
